name: Cheirosa Perfume Travel Minis Set
about: Set Description: This four-piece limited edition collection features travel sizes of Sol de Janeirou2019s best-selling scents: irresistible and sunny Cheirosa 62u2122, enchanting and in bloom Cheirosa 68, sultry and delicate Cheirosa 40, and uplifting and delicious Cheirosa 59...This Set Contains:- 4 x 1 oz/ 30 mL Perfume Mists in Cheirosa 62u2122 Perfume Mist, Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist, Cheirosa 40 Perfume Mist, Cheirosa 59 Perfume Mist
ingredients: Cheirosa 62u2122 Perfume Mist:.Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hydroxycitronellal, Coumarin, Limonene, Linalool, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Eugenol...Cheirosa 68 Perfume Mist:.Aqua (Water, Eau), Cetearyl Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Isopentyldiol, Glyceryl Stearate, C13-16 Isoparaffin, Glycerin, Pyrus Malus (Apple) Fruit Extract, Cetyl Alcohol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Caryodendron Orinocense (Cacay) Seed Oil, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Behenyl Alcohol, Squalane, Collagen Amino Acid, Theobroma Grandiflorum (Cupuau00e7u) Seed Butter, Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) Resin, Astrocaryum Vulgare (Tucumu00e3) Kernel Oil, Astrocaryum Murumuru Seed Butter, Daucus Carota Sativa (Carrot) Root Extract, Tocopherol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Heptyl Undecylenate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Xanthan Gum, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Mica, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide)...Cheirosa 40 Perfume Mist:.Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance)...Cheirosa 59 Perfume Mist:.Alcohol Denat., Aqua (Water, Eau), Parfum (Fragrance), Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Hydroxycitronellal.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Spritz from head to toeu2014anytime and anywhere. .-May cause compliments.

Purchased this in October as a gift that I put away for Christmas. Was opened Christmas morning (taped shut) and it only had 3 of the scents. Received a duplicate of 40. Super super annoyed. Defeats the purpose. This was purchased over 60 days ago, so unlikely I can exchange. Angry that I paid so much for a useless gift.

reviews.review_text: I bought this about a month ago and wow! It smells so good and I love to rotate the different scents throughout the days. It's a great set if you want a lot of Sol de Janeiro scents, but don't feel like buying a full size of each. As soon as I run out, I will be buying more!

reviews.review_text: these can not be compared to B&BW! omg that is nonsense! i love minis, assorted packs & SdJ as a brand! buying this, full price! was a no brainer for me. I love how they look on my bathroom counter. plus the set makes an awesome gift for a fragrance lover & i also buy extra sets to break up for stocker stuffers. haters stop. don't u try scents b4 u buy them? u can go to sephora (& now ul!a) to try b4 u buy. if u ain't liking them that is ur own fault.

reviews.review_title: Very cheap, giving Bath and Body Works (but worse)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Sol de Janeiro but these mists are NOT it. Smells artificial and candy-sweet, like something I'd wear back when I was in middle school not as a grown woman. Ended up giving them to my nieces (who are teens) as it seemed more fitting for them. If you're looking for a quality body mist sampler, I'd recommend Kopari's set instead.

reviews.review_text: I saw a lot of hype around these fragrances and decided to try them for myself. Personally, the scent is disappointing and smells kinda cheap. Nice variety, but sometimes I can't tell the difference between two scents. Overpriced in my opinion.
